facebook/docusaurus.summary: Recent activities in the facebook/docusaurus repository involve a pull request that refactors the core functionality to utilize the native Intl API for determining locale direction, effectively removing the dependency on rtl-detect. This enhancement, proposed to improve performance and simplify dependencies, is currently undergoing review and has been designed to be compatible with Node versions 18 and above.
